title: How could I know what my next life on this Earth will be? And are there any ways by which I can dictate my next life on this Earth based on my desires? - Quora

response.answer_text: You do not consciously remember your past lives and you do not know your future life. Your next life is based on what you were intended to learn in this life so that you could move to a higher plane but did not learn. I will predict that you next life will include opportunities to learn that your desires are not the reason for your being here.
